entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 12 with temperature falling to 7 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Rain beginning in the morning. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 late in the afternoon. High 12 with temperature falling to 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
